words.definition: A red or green fruit that grows on trees
words.example: I eat an apple for a healthy snack

words.definition: A round object you can throw and catch
words.example: Let's play with the ball outside

words.definition: A small animal with four legs and whiskers
words.example: My cat likes to sleep on my lap

words.definition: A friendly animal that barks and wags its tail
words.example: The dog runs and plays at the park

words.definition: Something a chicken lays that you can cook and eat
words.example: I ate a scrambled egg for breakfast

words.definition: An animal that lives in water
words.example: The fish swims in the aquarium

words.definition: A place where you grow flowers and vegetables
words.example: We planted seeds in the garden

words.definition: A building where people live
words.example: My house has a big backyard

words.definition: Frozen water that is very cold
words.example: We skate on the ice in winter

words.definition: To push off the ground and go into the air
words.example: I can jump really high

words.definition: A toy that flies in the wind with a long string
words.example: I flew my kite on a windy day

words.definition: A big wild cat with a big mane
words.example: The lion roars loudly

words.definition: The bright light in the sky at night
words.example: The moon is round and pretty

words.definition: A home that birds make with twigs and grass
words.example: The bird made a nest in the tree

words.definition: A round orange fruit that is sweet and juicy
words.example: I peeled the orange and ate it

words.definition: A farm animal with a pink snout
words.example: The pig likes to play in the mud

words.definition: A woman who rules a kingdom
words.example: The queen wears a crown

words.definition: Colorful bands you see in the sky after rain
words.example: After the storm, we saw a rainbow

words.definition: A tiny bright light you see in the night sky
words.example: I counted the stars before bed

words.definition: A big plant with a trunk and leaves
words.example: We climbed the tree in our yard

words.definition: An exciting journey or experience
words.example: We went on an adventure to the mountains

words.definition: A vehicle with two wheels that you ride
words.example: I ride my bicycle around the neighborhood

words.definition: A colorful insect with big wings
words.example: The butterfly landed on the flower

words.definition: A tool you use to take pictures
words.example: I used my camera to take photos

words.definition: A very big animal that lived long ago
words.example: Dinosaurs were huge creatures

words.definition: A very large animal with a long trunk
words.example: The elephant has big ears

words.definition: A special bond between people who like each other
words.example: My friendship with my best friend is special

words.definition: A tall animal with a very long neck
words.example: The giraffe ate leaves from the top of the tree

words.definition: The line where the sky meets the ground or water
words.example: The sun set over the horizon

words.definition: A piece of land surrounded by water
words.example: We took a boat to the island
